channel.title: How do i keep my server 24/7?
channel.description:
Hey im running my server for about a month. I put my computer on "sleep" when im going to bed or i have homework. Ive been noticing a pattern in players telling me , 1 hour after i leave the server turns off and says "error connecting to server". i dont understand why its doing this when i put my computer to sleep! can any on help me in any way shape or form, to help me keep my server always on.
Thing i do when i leave: Leave Runserver.bat on close all other programs then click sleep and turn off monitor. Please reply and help me.
Also how do i keep skypkpker out of my server. ive seen some tutorials but they said ive needed void.run ? whats that can some one give me a easy way of keeping them out without telling me i have to usually be there to stop it. Thank you so much for reading this have a nice day.

item.title: How do i keep my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Lol, honestly this is a retarded question. but there is no such thing as those. anyways.
You can buy a vps ( 40 bucks a month) and it keeps your server very stable for a month.
Or you can get a new computer
the best new computer would be a
windows vista, with a 8gb RAM 3ghz, and a 500gb memory capacity.

To some it up: the more memory your computer has and the more ram it has, the longer it will say up without crashing.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i keep my server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Try leaving it just fully on for one night but with the monitor off still, and see if putting it on sleep is the problem. Do your parents turn off the router/computer off at night? Mine do sometimes, which is a massive pain in the ass when I’m still up on the computer in my bedroom lol.

Alternatively you good get a friend to host it for your, or buy a dedicated server and/or VPS (Virtual Private Server). Just google ‘Dedicated Server’ or ‘VPS’ for more info.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep my server 24/7?
